tool_description: Tracks and manages payment status, processes transactions, and handles deposit and final payment workflows for portrait photography bookings.

client_id.description: Unique client identifier for payment tracking

contract_id.description: Contract identifier associated with the payment

payment_type.description: Type of payment: deposit, final_payment, full_payment, additional_charges

payment_amount.description: Payment amount in dollars (must be positive)

payment_method.description: Payment method: credit_card, bank_transfer, check, cash, paypal

error_messages: Client not found: The specified client_id does not exist in the system.
Contract not found: The specified contract_id does not exist or is invalid.
Invalid payment type: Use one of [deposit, final_payment, full_payment, additional_charges].
Invalid payment amount: Payment amount must be a positive number.
Invalid payment method: Use one of [credit_card, bank_transfer, check, cash, paypal].
Payment processing failed: Transaction could not be completed due to payment processor error.
Insufficient payment: Payment amount is less than required for this payment type.
usage: Provide client_id, contract_id, payment_type, payment_amount, and payment_method to process and track payments. The tool will validate amounts against contract terms and update payment status.

transaction_id.description: Unique transaction identifier for this payment

payment_status.description: Payment processing result: completed, pending, failed, or refunded

remaining_balance.description: Outstanding balance remaining on the contract

next_payment_due.description: Date when next payment is due in ISO 8601 format
